snippet: LEAD: ''Fall is definitely here,'' my husband said the other morning, returning from the front yard with the newspapers. How did he know? ''Because the car seats are damp,'' he said. ''I guess it's time to put the top up.''...
lead_paragraph: LEAD: ''Fall is definitely here,'' my husband said the other morning, returning from the front yard with the newspapers. How did he know? ''Because the car seats are damp,'' he said. ''I guess it's time to put the top up.''

headline.main: Where Summer Subtly Slips Into Fall

byline.original: By ANNE TAYLOR FLEMING, Special to the New York Times
